Law for Tourism & Hospitality

To provide students with a basic understanding of the hospitality and tourism law with emphasis on the commercial aspects and parliamentary legislation in the hospitality and tourism industry. Knowledge in law would be essential in the operation of any hospitality and tourism industry

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Examine the use of the principles law of contract in the hospitality and tourism industry.

+  Relate the application of the law of tort in the hospitality and tourism industry.

+  Apply the usage of commercial law in the hospitality and tourism industry.

+  Illustrate the principles of laws related to business entities to the hospitality and tourism industry.

+  Consider the application of employment law in the hospitality and tourism industry.

+  Analyze the legal issues in the hospitality and tourism industry.
